cause.description:
Malaria No More is determined to end malaria deaths in Africa by 2015. Malaria is a preventable and treatable disease and recent progress shows that malaria's days are numbered — but we need your help. Together, we can make malaria no more.
Malaria No More leverages high-impact awareness campaign to engage the world, global advocacy to rally leadership and strategic investments in Africa to accelerate progress, build capacity and save lives.
Want to find out more? Visit http://www.malarianomore.org
"Like" us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/malarianomore Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/malarianomore
cause.mission: Malaria No More is determined to end malaria deaths in Africa by 2015 -- and we're helping the world get it done.
cause.name: End Malaria Deaths with Malaria No More
